item.title: Zaif API for Google Apps Script
item.description: Gists This sample script is for using Zaif API by Google Apps Script. The following go script is a sample at Zaif API. package main import ( "fmt" "time" "strconv" "crypto/hmac" "crypto/sha512" "io/ioutil" "net/http" "encoding/hex" "net/url" "strings" ) var key = "<your_key>" var secret = "<your_secret>" func main() { uri := "https://api.zaif.jp/tapi" values := url.Values{} values.Add("method", "get_info") values.Add("nonce", strconv.FormatInt(time.Now().Unix(), 10)) encodedParams := values.Encode() req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", uri, strings.NewReader(encodedParams)) hash := hmac.
